author: Wei Keat Tee
message:
I sit a lot at work. So my back tends to bend without me noticing, causing some soreness, even around the neck and shoulders. Coming here has been a relief.

In terms of assessment, very throughout. Every sore spot can be felt. Just have to make sure to let him know where exactly and it'll make things easy.

author: Brandon
message: Lower back pain has been plaguing me for a long period of my life. It was affecting my work as a chef where I had to stand long hours. I was skeptical of Chiropractic at first, however, Eugene has assured me and shown my the miracles that â€¦

message: One of the best chiropractors out there! They make sure to find the root of your problem and solve it. Professional and experienced! Would definitely look for Eugene to solve your spine problems

message: He is very professional ,My condition improved so much after the treatment,   I have confidence in him .

message: Incredible professional, helped me with my lower back pain and upper back tightness. Cannot recommend enough.
